reviewText: Borderline hentai in PG mode.  About a boy that is a porn writer and he attends a high school for geniuses due to his thought processes and love for his talent.  His talent is pushed to the boundaries by his Editor-in-Chief of the school newspaper.  She demands extremes from him to open his doors to things he's never thought about, but helps different girls along the way during his growing process with their problems.  Since each of these women are geniuses too, they open themselves to accept and understand what they miss in their work or their passion through. . .porn.  It could happen. . .
this is for under 13 .  if it had not blocked out all the good parts it might have been better.

Having just recieved my copy of this trash from another supplier,( but for $11 and change ),I can now say positively what I suspected for some time, that being that this is so highly censored as to be unwatchable. There is so many white blank-outs that one would think he( why would any female watch this!?) was watching the weather channel showing a blizzard. Add to the censoring of even panties,what one is left with is a nasty story about a teen-aged pervert. There are several suppliers that sell this for under $12 to $25 but,if they have the same cover as mine,which is the same as the one in the above thumbnails,or are out of Malaysia,they are censored and stuff like this has no purpose otherwise: "18" on the sticker on the DVD box means the story was nasty enough for that rating,not that it still is. As true hard-core animated porn,if you are into that boring stuff,is less than half the cost listed, I am at a loss trying to understand why anyone would waste that much money on something so censored,pervered and boring. There are suppliers that will supply an unaltered version of such but they state it up-front although I haven't found such a supplier for this one and am not really that interested in doing so after I saw how "criminally" sexually pervered the main character was. Censored,over-priced and,ultimately,nauseous.
